channel.title: "Your Account Has Been Disabled..."
channel.description:
Ok what the hell is this... Im the Owner and im disabled for trying to go to my mod zone....
Anyone know how to undisable a character??
Thanks, Josh[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:26:36 am[/size][hr]Ahh Nvm i got it i was banned for no reason lol

No, i want the place to stay there but i want it so only admins and mods can go in there.

item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Remove the “Mod” and “Admin” command. That is usually what happens

Read full topic

item.title: "Your Account Has Been Disabled..."
item.dc:creator: @Josh21210 Josh21210
item.description:
@Josh21210 wrote:

Is there a way to fix this so i can have users go into my mod/admin zone??

Read full topic

item.title: "Your Account Has Been Disabled..."
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You go into your Data folder and look for the bannedusers file. Your account name should be in there; remove it. You’re source probably doesn’t allow the correct “rights” to use that code. As a matter of fact, I know a few codes on Allstar that don’t work at all, and if you try using them you automatically get banned if your username isn’t Mod Allstar.

Search for the code you typed in, and if it appends you to ban by using it, delete it. You’re going to have to set your own preferences as to who uses the code and who doesn’t, as well as the code itself if you don’t have it.

Read full topic
